title: Prison School: Mad Wax
original_name: 監獄学園[プリズンスクール] マッドワックス
opening_song: "Ai no Prison (愛のプリズン)" by Kangoku Danshi (監獄男子) (Hiroshi Kamiya, Katsuyuki Konishi, Kenichi Suzumura, Daisuke Namikawa, Kazuyuki Okitsu)
ending_song: "Tsumibukaki Oretachi no Sanka (罪深き 俺たちの賛歌)" by Kangoku Danshi (監獄男子) (Hiroshi Kamiya, Katsuyuki Konishi, Kenichi Suzumura, Daisuke Namikawa, Kazuyuki Okitsu)
sinopse:
The OVA featured the previously unanimated "Mad Wax" arc from the manga.

Bundled with a limited edition of the manga's 20th volume.
